description: The Cape Town art museum is a museum with art.
Randy Warthog is a lit bar with slightly less lit people.
The iX store is a great place for getting branded gear so you can dress like a TA!
The movie theater at the V&A mall has great deals on tickets but awful caramel popcorn.
Hike the three peak challenge: Devil's Peak, Table Mountain, and Lion's Head. Good luck not dying!
